ygData.subject: Re: Where to hunt, 17 and beyond
ygData.msgSnippet: I am in S. Ro right now, at lvl 18.  The xp is not as good as oasis but the killing is constant and there is actual loot!  I hunt mainly undead, some madmen
ygData.messageBody:
I am in S. Ro right now, at lvl 18. The xp is not as good as oasis but the
killing is constant and there is actual loot! I hunt mainly undead, some
madmen for water, there seems to be quite a few ghouls and the Dry Bones,
some still yellow. Be careful in the middle of the zone, near the Dark Elf
camp, things like to swarm there. Got killed there last night by 3 madmen 2
ghouls and a DB :(

Another question I am almost 19, so where is a good place for lvl 20s to
hunt?


Shadoewalker
lvl 19
Brell
----- Original Message -----
From: <Clanof1@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, December 29, 1999 11:08 PM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Where to hunt, 17 and beyond


> From: Clanof1@...
>
> Oasis is getting mighty boring, real crowded real cramped
> Lake rathe and SK are pretty much the same
> Where could i go for some real good fast experience?
>
> > This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
